name: Phil Manzanera
description: '''Phillip Geoffrey Targett-Adams''' (born 31 January 1951), known professionally as '''Phil Manzanera''', is an English musician, songwriter and record producer. He is the lead guitarist with [[Roxy Music]], and was the lead guitarist with [[801 (band)|801]] and [[Quiet Sun]]. In 2006, Manzanera co-produced [[David Gilmour]]'s album ''[[On an Island]]'', and played in Gilmour's band for tours in Europe and North America. He wrote and presented a series of 14 one-hour radio programmes for station [[Planet Rock (radio station)|Planet Rock]] entitled ''The A-Z of Great Guitarists''.
